website_summaries.verdict: The HTC One continues to be a well-designed, powerful 1080p Android smartphone, but the five-month wait for a Verizon Wireless version didn't do it any favors.
cons: No removable battery or memory card slot

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy old phones
customer_reviews.text: My son had this phone already and like it. Problem was that the USB connector got sloppy. Tried different (new) cables and just decided to order another (refurbished). The connector was only marginally better on the new and someone had hacked the operating system. It would not update and could not get some apps to load and / or operate.
customer_reviews.author: John Comphel

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: These are the major problems: 1) This phone has problems holding a charge for a full day. 2) If you plan on using anything with GPS it is even worse. When the GPS is used the aluminum case get extremely hot and difficult to hold. 3) When making a call you can't use the speakerphone because of too much feedback. For example, when calling a voice response system it thinks you have responded and you are directed to some random selection.
customer_reviews.author: Donncha

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: I am 98% satisfied with this product. The first problem I have is that the period button is somewhat close the the home button, so sometimes you accidentally activate the home button in the middle of typing a text message. It can get kind of annoying, but it isn't a huge deal. I LOVE the little infrared controller in this device that allows me to control my tv. It's unique in that manner. The second problem I have is that it takes a long time to charge. Everything else in this phone is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: still a nice phone in it's old age.  definitely still worth considering..
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for over 2 years now and it's still great. I've always loaded it up with apps and they've all run perfectly and fast. The camera takes quality pictures in good light and does pretty well in the dark. I've dropped it a thousand times and it still looks great, the screen has resisted scratching. Even after 2 years the battery stays charged all day even with regular and sometimes heavy use. I really can't say anything bad about this phone, it's far exceeded my expectations. I'd highly recommend it (or the newer version) to anyone considering it.
customer_reviews.author: Norma M Clark

customer_reviews.title: I like it but I'll probably switch back to iphone when this contract is up
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this over a year now. I still don't love the fact that the power/wake screen button is on top of the phone. Hated it for the first month or so, I'm over it but the iphone button on the front is much more convenient. I still wish that text messages made the screen wake and show the message, I tried apps to make this happen and none worked. otherwise, it's a good phone. great speakers!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a Motorola Droid. The HTC One looks fantastic and is much faster than my older phone. The main problem I have is that it is metal so it is hard to hold next to your ear with your neck because it tends to fall. This is not reason enough to deduct a rating star though. This is my first HTC phone and would purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a very low price off Amazon. Much lower than other places. This is the best smartphone I have had to date. I have had it over a year now and it just works very well. No weird stuff, no locking up, battery lasts over a full day. Very good quality feel to it. I do have a thin case and glass cover and have dropped this thing dozens of times and it keeps working.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Beats Audio does make a difference. Mine was for the Verizon network. Don't buy the sim card. Take the phone to a Verizon corporate store and they will install it for free and add to an existing account. In store activation on a new contract is $20 per line but you can activate online for free.
customer_reviews.author: Jim James

customer_reviews.title: My HTC M7 came with a terrible battery, it dies within an hour
customer_reviews.text: My HTC M7 came with a terrible battery, it dies within an hour. Do not let my review prevent a purchase as the seller was more than willing to exchange it for me. That is the risk you take with pre owned cell phones. Great phone otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T Dimmick

customer_reviews.title: I didn't have this problem with samsung or other phone's in the smart phone section
customer_reviews.text: I can't do thing's that you would normally be able to on other phones. You have to go through several page's to be able to either move a number to another page or to get to a number of the same person with several dif numbers to text while your in messeging is impossible. I feel this phone needs work in being user friendly. I didn't have this problem with samsung or other phone's in the smart phone section. I'm going to be selling this phone to go back to better user friendly phone like samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and quality product. I can tell jut by the solid feeling and weight. I think its metal and it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Pharmgal

customer_reviews.title: I like HTC. I'm used to it now
customer_reviews.text: I'm still using this phone, keeping ,y old unlimited data plan with Verizon. It's slowing down a bit, so I'm due for an upgrade, but I sure didn't mind not paying Verizon for the phone. I like HTC. I'm used to it now. I just don't like that I can't have it ring and vibrate at the same time. The speakers are really good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Really good phone.
customer_reviews.text: This phone was awesome. Had no issues with it for the 2 years I used it, until I shattered the screen, but I was not gentle with it and it took 2 years to crack the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: Love the metal Back
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best phones I've ever had I have a Galaxy S9 it does not have some of the features that this Does like speakers In the front of Screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone has an Iphone. I didn't want to be like everyone else. I had an HTC Incredible. Liked it much but it was getting old and would not hold too much more data. I looked on Verizon's website to upgrade. The price was $166 with renewal of my 2 year contract. Bit much. I stumbled across the same phone on Amazon's webpages a few days later. Get this: just $29!!! Heck yeah! I am pleased with the phones functionality and the screen quality is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Snow

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I currently use a Samsung Galaxy Note 2 as my main cell phone, and recently purchased this one for my wife. I must say I really like the look and feel of the HTC One. It's smaller in size and can easily be held in one hand unlike the SGN2. I also able to make the text below the icons larger on the main screen, something that wasn't possible on the SGN2. Nice Solid Feel, Nice features, love it. ABM
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: Really well-made phone
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous in leaving the Samsung Galaxy line, but I have been delighted by how well the HTC one performs and how easy (using HTC transfer) I was able to port all my old info over to the phone. The one key thing to be aware of is that the battery is fixed in this one (like an iphone) so you are to some extent stuck with the power level.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R

customer_reviews.title: Solid Phone
customer_reviews.text: Our family now owns four of these phones. Two were purchased almost a year ago, and I was so happy with them we bought two more for other family members. Battery life is good, the camera works well both in still mode and video mode, the sound is surprisingly good, and we have had no problems. If you're looking for a solid phone, you should definitely consider this one.
customer_reviews.author: Father of Two Boys

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it a few days but it's amazing. This phone came out well over a year ago and it's still better than anything else on the market. One little complaint, it did not include a sim card. It was an amazon warehouse deal and it said everything was included. Not a big deal, they gave me one free at the verizon store and I like the phone enough to still give a very positive review. I love amazon warehouse deals, they save me hundreds of dollars for reliable electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Panozzo

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good phone for the price. I'm glad I didn't purchase this brand. The camera takes pinkish pictures. Apparently this is a known issue with this particular phone.
customer_reviews.author: IM

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Mostly this phone has been fine, except for two rather big issues. I cannot get the GPS to be functionally useful and Google maps works very poorly despite having the proper settings turned on. Also I've had issues when speaking on the phone - if I don't remember to shut the screen off, I inadvertently end up switching on the mute button, or even worse the speaker function which then blasts my eardrum. The latter issue I can cope with, but am really bummed about the poor navigation as I've really relied on this feature with previous smartphones. Given all the other good reviews, I suspect it's just an issue with my phone. Nonetheless would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!!
customer_reviews.text: this phone is great really enjoyed everything about it has a really long battery life did not experienced any problems with the battery.lightweight sleek good on umeverything that you need a phone to do it does without any problems so far I've had it since Black Friday I ordered it for Black Friday on amazon.com for a penny and so far no complaints really pleased with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.DPD

customer_reviews.title: Best phone on the market
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say that hasn't been said. My fiancee owns an S4 and my sister has an S3 and they both like the look and software experience of this phone better. I've always enjoyed stock Android and thought Sense 5 would be a nuisance, but I've come to enjoy it (especially blinkfeed). Great looks, good battery life, great sound, display, and tons of power. It's easily my favorite phone I've owned, and I would buy it again and again and again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I chose 5 stars because it is the best phone I have had to date. The kicker is that I only paid $50 for it with my upgrade. The HTC Zoe is my favorite aspect of the phone. I made a boring video of me driving home from work and Zoe turned it into an awesome Montage with music and effects automatically. I didn't have to do a stitch of editing. The feel of the phone is impecible. I love how it feels.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Ramon Echevarria

customer_reviews.title: Verizon has no SIM card that fits!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of the HTC phone. The only problem with this phone is that Verizon does not have a SIM card that fits it. I was really looking forward to using this phone I will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Bizns

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for a while
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for a while, but the top speaker blew out within months of light use. After about 12 months of moderate use, the motherboard committed suicide. I've since had another M7, an M8, and a Mini 2, all had similar problems. HTC simply doesn't have the quality they used to.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Meyer

customer_reviews.title: The phone is electrically messed up, it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone is electrically messed up, it does not charge passed 31% I wish my mother would of mentioned this to me, but since it was a birthday gift she didnt want to upset me. This does not even deserve a rating of one star, the sender had it sent out knowing it was not working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Don_Chingon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend, but she is accustomed to iphones and was frustrated with this phone, so I decided to upgrade and use it myself. I love it. It is fast and has so many really great features. I never thought I'd leave my Motorola Droids, but this phone has won me over.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, sent it back. Slow, locked up all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Theresa

customer_reviews.title: HTC One Good So Far
customer_reviews.text: I had the HTC Thunderbolt and never had a problem with it. The batter stopped holding a charge so I figured I would upgrade. The only concern I have is the fact that it does not have a removable battery. I figured I would take and chance and see. It takes great pictures and operates great. The only thing I miss that my old phone had is the "kickstand". This gave me something to hold onto and helped prevent dropping the phone. Other than that everything works good so far. Note I have had it for only a couple months so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gamauf

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Had a funky screen defect that affected the viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I am really liking the phone. Great screen, and features. The only downside is the battery is not quite as long lasting as I would like. With amazon it was a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Apostle

customer_reviews.title: HTCOne
customer_reviews.text: HTCOne is the best smart phone that I have had. Excellent battery life. Usually lasts all day without recharge. Easy to use. Can access information quickly. Phone quality is excellent and Beats sound is superb.
customer_reviews.author: JoeA

customer_reviews.title: Great product and came in near perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. Great product and came in near perfect condition. I spent a little more for the quality but it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich.and.Angie

customer_reviews.title: Drool.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah. Its pretty much as good as everyone is saying it is. No criticism. I LOVE this phone. I had a windows phone before this and was contantly frustrated by it. The difference is undeniable. This is a big boy phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I want ANOTHER ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone so much, I just logged on to buy another one. Very user-friendly, with excellent picture quality. After a year and a half, with several drops, the battery power seems to have shortened dramatically, and I guess my only complaint would be that it cannot be changed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS PHONE FOR MY 24 YEAR OLD SON AND AT THE PRICE HE LOVES THE PHONE ONE OF THE BEST PHONES HE HAS EVER HAD
customer_reviews.author: RUDY

customer_reviews.title: Good phone if you get it a a good price...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this phone for only about two weeks now, but so far I haven't had any issues... It's a typical smart phone with a good camera... For the price $19, I'm happy with it...
customer_reviews.author: Nesnat

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: Solid, good price, great customer service from HTC. Good size, good weight. Love the gorilla glass. Inexpensive case fit like a glove. No problems after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the best phone I've had to date. This is one impressive phone. Amazon had a great price on this phone. If you're looking for a phone, you have to look seriously at the HTC One.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin X. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone Yet
customer_reviews.text: This phone is absolutely amazing, and I couldn't be happier with this product! I got a great deal on Amazon too! It's a very fast phone, works amazing, has great audio and an awesome camera! This is the best phone yet!
customer_reviews.author: Kendal

customer_reviews.title: very well designed smartphone
customer_reviews.text: This is my third smartphone by far the best. My reason for selecting this phone was the beats audio and they don't disappoint. Have friends that's G3 and G4 and both like this unit. People whom say this phone is garbage have unrealistic expectations of smartphones in general. Overall I'm very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend to my own family and friends..
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: horrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Company sent a phone that did not work as advertised. Never heard back from customer support. Had to go to Verizon to correct the issue which they did on the spot with a brand new phone. My negative review is based on a lack of customer service and not the phone. I originally had a HTC one and lost it overseas that phone worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone, it's awesome. I'm not tech savvy enough to give you details in regards to memory or speed. For me it works great, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is of the best quality out there, as good as a GS4 and nearly as nice as a 5s. The front facing speakers are wonderful. Can't go wrong if you find it for a better price than an iphone or a GS4. I was worried I'd be disappointed but the phone is a total win. No regrets, and I'm picky.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Malerich

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The volume doesn't go very high. It does the job of what I need it to do. I'm just used to my Note 5 that I broke and didn't have ins. So this phone works good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Whyel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a flagship product well deserving of the praise it receives, the winning alternative to the overprices iPhone imho
customer_reviews.author: wmitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great reception, pictures and works for his pay as ...
customer_reviews.text: my son loves this phone! Great reception, pictures and works for his pay as you go Verizon plan.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Very quick and fast responses. Call quality is great. Only a $0.01 with a contract when I purchased it. you will not find a better phone for that price. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wofford

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more pleased with this phone or with the price I paid for it. The screen size is huge, the front facing speakers are loud, the phone is so fast and I got it on Amazon for over a hundred dollars cheaper than through Verizon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is awesome. I will not review this because you can find numerous reviews by experts and owners. However, getting a phone through Amazon is the best. They have the best deals and I was able to grandfather my Verizon unlimited data through here even with a subsidized phone. Can't do that through Verizon. Win-win. Buy it from Amazon from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Craig J Updegrove

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad phone if it was fully operational
customer_reviews.text: I would of been fine with the phone but when the microphone didn't work then it bothered me. If I did make a call, I had to turn the speaker phone on and then there was an echo. I just wish they would test the phones before they send it out. But they weren't the only ones that I had problems with.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Hohensee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool phone, super fast and was in good condition when I got it. (used)
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Item seems to work majority of the time, weird ...
customer_reviews.text: Item seems to work majority of the time, weird thing happens where the phone just turns off during the middle of things, other than that quality of phone seems good
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Le

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: If your Verizon contract is up get your phone on Amazon instead of the VZW website. You will save yourself $$$$$. Love this phone. Super fast, takes great pictures and the speaker sound is exceptional!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Best Android Deal Going!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this phone 4 Stars. You will not find a better quad core phone, with less issues for the price. This phone is blazing faster , faster then the galaxy s 4 Even. The only thing its missing is external SD card =(
customer_reviews.author: Lawrance Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It was really a great phone but i got one issue with it
customer_reviews.text: It was really a great phone but i got one issue with it.I am a Kenyan how can I enable it to support features such as creating a mobile data hotspot since our simcards are not recognised as Verizon simcards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid phone. ill recommended if you signing 2 year contract
customer_reviews.text: i love this phone. very simple like a Iphone on steriods. the booming speakers are wild, its a great quality built.
customer_reviews.author: francisco

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Does everything i want with the HTC user interface yet. Last Update took away a bit of features that worked b4, but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and a lot of fun, actually, and I'm new to smartphones, but so far very very great!
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: It is very annoying because I cannot make a private call and everyone ...
customer_reviews.text: The only way to make a phone call is by using the speaker phone option on the phone. It is very annoying because I cannot make a private call and everyone around me hears the other person on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B McBride

customer_reviews.title: ... try it out and I purchased it for an awesome low
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a HTC one M7 can't wait to get the phone and try it out and I purchased it for an awesome low price
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Miller

customer_reviews.title: I've dropped it a handful of times and it still works!
customer_reviews.text: My tech-savvy boyfriend recommended this phone to me and is now jealous. I refuse to talk to my phone so I can't say much about the voice recognition feature but I love this phone. I purchased it to replace my iphone and am incredibly happy with it. The screen is beautiful, the camera on it takes awesome pictures and the battery lasts me hours longer than any combination of smart phones I've had in the past. And I've already dropped this phone a handful of times and it hasn't shown any damage ...like my iPhone. Great purchase and I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: nicolevclc

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Super fast phone. Easy to use and the speakers are very powerful. Setup was easy as well. It only took a few minutes to upload all my contacts and apps from my old phone. I was eligible for an upgrade. Got it $100 cheaper with Amazon than I would have through Verizon.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S Lake

customer_reviews.title: great phone wouldn't be able to tell it was refurbished ...
customer_reviews.text: great phone wouldn't be able to tell it was refurbished if it wasn't in the description I would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone and in perfect condition (despite listing claiming a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone and in perfect condition (despite listing claiming a couple of small scratches). Had charger and headphones and all I needed was a $10 SIM card. Very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: HTC One
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Feels great to the touch, easy activation, and runs really quick. I recommend this phone over the iPhone 5s or galaxy s4
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: I request a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Got mine, SIM card tray is deff broken. Calls drop due to SIM error or no SIM card reading. Feel as if I deserve a new device. Typically wireless liquidators isn't like this. Guess I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dan simonelli

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could not use phone because it didn't have a proper ISBN.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Compares to my old galaxy s4 very well. Screen and phone are particularly good.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone, it is fast and smooth. I am coming from an iPhone 4 and took me about a day to get used to the Android OS. This phone is much faster at tasks and faster at connecting to the internet than my old iPhone 4.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I love it, everything I expected and more. Not to big, great size beautiful screen. Very fast, would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JCV805

customer_reviews.title: Do I still have time to return this phone
customer_reviews.text: It will not make or receive calls. Everything else works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, this is my first smart phone. I was already somewhat familiar with the capabilities after using an iPod Touch for a couple of years. But, once I upgraded to the HTC One, I was amazed at what else I was missing! I'm so glad I made the switch!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Reissig

customer_reviews.title: Older phone, has all features one could want considering ...
customer_reviews.text: Older phone, has all features one could want considering phones about 3-4 years older. Got it as a cheap replacement for my broken HTC DNA. No complaints other than size.
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: Best smartphone ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smart phone I have ever owned. The display is clear and crisp, the screen is highly responsive, and HTC's Android is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the Greatest phone ever made. It's lightening fast, extremely user friendly, and has a durable and sleek design . A+++
customer_reviews.author: Brian Yates

customer_reviews.title: Bayshine Store was fast! Phones Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Phones awesome, faster than my LG G2 was. Better touch response also. Bayshine Store shipped same day and replied to my emails within Minutes! Great experience through and through!
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Interface is fast, pretty standard Android, but the battery life is starting to deteriorate after just 4-5 months. Glad I got a Mophie but sad I will need to be relying on it so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Charger doesn't work and charger port on phone won't hold the charger in place. Not to happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zaccary Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Front facing speakers,,, the killer app
customer_reviews.text: While HTC One construction is fabulous... and the technology inside is first rate... the stars of the show are those front facing speakers. So simple a concept! HTC... this is a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: C Square

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Its battery sucks and the phone has major problems I should have just bought new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone! I have had it for quite some ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone ! I have had it for quite some time now and am very pleased with it .
customer_reviews.author: LuisM.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beats audio is great. Camera is very poor. Breaking the screen is a very expensive fix! Buy the insurance!
customer_reviews.author: K Anderson

customer_reviews.title: great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my HTC One! It is fast, easy to use, and has great battery life! This is the best phone I have ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Phone is great, carrier is irritating.
customer_reviews.text: This is fine piece of tech. But I'm a computer geek, and if I want to put a custom ROM on it, dang it, I will! But Verizon has made that pretty darn tough. They're the only carrier that's doing so with this device at the time of this writing. I recommend the phone, but not the carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever used, battery life, functionality, quality feel of the actual phone. The Android Operating system integration truly makes my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Jaspan

customer_reviews.title: More than what i could look forward to, in a phone.
customer_reviews.text: All the good features of the earlier HTC phone, my son had. Wow! Awesome picture quality and sound to add.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sreedhar

customer_reviews.title: had it for a month now
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone, not many complaints at this time. It's user friendly, easy to use. I would recommend this phone
customer_reviews.author: Ashtan Wible

customer_reviews.title: great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Fast, lots of memory and very customizable. The large screen and resolution are great as well. This was an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: The best phone I've ever possessed.
customer_reviews.text: Two words: in love. Better than any phone out. I acquired it because of the tech specs. But the phone itself is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Martin

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This phone is the best one I could have purchased. The price was Unbeatable by all of the big stores
customer_reviews.author: Jeremey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, well built phone. Fast and no lag. Battery life is beyond expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Att Vixayvong

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: read all the views which I do on a lot of items,liked all the features especially the camera and video.got great reviews on the product
customer_reviews.author: can of energy

customer_reviews.title: Not that good a phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father to replace a different brand phone that took a swim to avoid a huge bill from my carrier for cutting the contract short. People have a hard time hearing him and they say he sounds like he's in a tunnel. He occasionally has a hard time hearing others as well. Going to have to suckit up and buy him a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Trouble with speakers, fuzzy buzzing over ringing and voices, both with and without headohones. Touchy dial pad calls random people after I hit the contact I want to dial. Messaging/Google chat compete. Messaging announces my VOICE MAILS. With no way to turn that function off. Confusing live feed screen. Totally unnecessary function. I am very disappointed, as I loved my Incredible II.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The first week I used the phone, it told ...
customer_reviews.text: The first week I used the phone, it told me I had went over my overages. Is this is a 32gb, I was expecting not to have any overages.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Cowden

customer_reviews.title: awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: I've had iPhones and then Samsung droids for years last one being Samsung galaxy s3. This phone is by far the best I've had. Verizon is also the best service in the bay area in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: jlr

customer_reviews.title: HTC One
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the Smartphone arena, so I should have ordered the , the user manual, lucky for me, my nephew walked me thru the basics. I love the camera on this phone!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: dead pixels!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think these phones are new. Maybe refurbished at best. I got mine and there are more than 10 dead pixels on the screen. I wouldn't expect that from a "new' phone.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Whitcomb

product_meta.title: HTC One M7, Silver 32GB (Verizon Wireless)
product_meta.description:
The HTC One (M7) is ready to reshape your smartphone experience with a live home screen that streams all of your favorite content, a photo gallery that comes to life, and dual frontal stereo speakers. This 4G LTE-enabled Android smartphone also features an UltraPixel 4MP camera with enhanced low-light performance. The HTC One's full metal body features a slim, solid construction with tapered edges for a satisfying grip, and it's complemented by a brilliant 4.7-inch Full HD 1080p display that resists scratches and reduces glare. It's powered by a 1.7 GHz quad-core processor, and it's packed with 32GB of storage and 2GB of RAM for excellent multitasking. This device is also equipped with quadband GSM and WCDMA modes for international use. 





AMAZON.COM


Crafted with a distinct zero-gap aluminum unibody, the HTC One is ready to reshape your smartphone experience with a live home screen that streams all of your favorite content, a photo gallery that comes to life, and dual frontal stereo speakers. This 4G LTE-enabled smartphone runs Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean), which combines with HTC Sense to create an amazing mobile experience that's been re-imagined from the ground up.

The HTC One ensures you're never out of touch with your world (view larger). The HTC One's full metal body features a slim, solid construction with tapered edges for a satisfying grip, and it's complemented by a brilliant 4.7-inch Full HD 1080p display that resists scratches and reduces glare. It's powered by a 1.7 GHz quad-core processor, and it's packed with 32 GB of storage and 2 GB of RAM for excellent multitasking. 

HTC ULTRAPIXEL CAMERA WITH HTC ZOE: YOUR PHOTOS BROUGHT TO LIFE
The HTC UltraPixel Camera redefines how you capture, relive, and share your most precious moments. With this innovative camera technology, you'll be able to quickly shoot vivid, true-to-life images with a wide range of colors, even in low light conditions -- it lets in 300 percent more light, enabling you to take photos indoors without a flash. And this is accomplished not by increasing the number of megapixels in the camera, but by engineering a more advanced CMOS Sensor, ISP, and optical lens system that captures significantly more light than most 8 or 13 megapixel cameras.

With HTC Zoe mode, press the shutter and the HTC One automatically captures up to 20 photos and a 3-second video -- including the last second of images before you tapped the picture button. It can also create a 30-second Zoe Highlight film from each event comprised of Zoes, photos, and videos with professionally designed cuts, transitions, and effects -- just ad your choice of pre-loaded soundtrack. These highlight videos can be remixed or set to different themes, and can be easily shared on social networks, email, and other services.

Multi-axis optical image stabilization for the rear camera also helps ensure video footage smoother whether stationary or on the move. Other features and effects include enhanced 360-degree panorama, time sequencing, and object removal. Self portraits and video are also easily captured via the front-facing camera, which supports 1080p video capture.

HTC BLINKFEED: A PERSONAL LIVE STREAM ON YOUR HOME SCREEN
At the heart of the HTC One experience is HTC BlinkFeed, which transforms your home screen into a single live stream of the things that are most important to you --from sports and technology to games and fashion and even your favorite social network feeds. It's all customized by you, and it's constantly updated live. 

To see more detail, just tap on any item in your HTC BlinkFeed to view text, pictures and videos, and then share it with just a couple more taps. HTC provides both local and global content from more than 1,400 media sources with more than 10,000 articles per day from a wide variety of media sources.

SPEC HIGHLIGHTS
 * 3G/4G LTE connectivity
   
   Sprint 4G LTE network is available in limited markets
   
   
 * Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) with HTC Sense
   
   
 * 1.7 GHz quad-core processor
   
   
 * 4.7-inch touchscreen Full HD display (1080 x 1920) 
   
   
 * HTC UltraPixel Camera on the rear 
   
   
 * Front 2.1-MP camera with 1080p video
   
   
 * 32 GB storage + 2 GB of RAM
   
   
 * Wireless-N Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 4.0 + NFC
   
   
 * Up to 19 hours of usage time
   
   
 * See full specs below

HTC BOOMSOUND: SHARPER, RICHER, LOUDER
One of the best audio experiences of any mobile phone available today, HTC BoomSound features front-facing stereo speakers with a dedicated amplifier and an amazing full HD display that immerses you in music, videos, games and the YouTube clips you love. Beats Audio integration is enabled across the entire experience for rich, authentic sound whether you're listening to your favorite music, watching a YouTube video or playing a game.

HTC SENSE TV: YOUR INTERACTIVE TV GUIDE
Tired of remotes taking up valuable couch space? The new HTC One is ready to help you channel surf. With Sense TV, all it takes is a few simple steps and you'll be able to select TV channels, access program guides, adjust audio, and more with your HTC One. Find your favorite shows, and it will notify you when they're on. 

HTC Sense TV also lets you easily control your TV, set-top box, and home theater, right from your phone -- so you never have to search for your remote again. 

EASY SETUP
HTC BACKUP AND RESTORE
Keep all the stuff on your HTC One safe, no matter what happens. Your vital phone settings, accounts, and apps are all backed up to the cloud daily, automatically.

DNA TRANSFER
Just connect your old phone to Wi-Fi to transfer your contacts, photos, music, videos, calendar, and more to your new HTC One. 

HTC SYNC MANAGER
Sync your personal info, photos, music, and even iTunes files from your Mac or PC onto your new HTC One. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
HTC One smartphone, 2300 mAh battery, USB cable, wall charger, stereo headset, quick start guide

SEAMLESS ACCESS TO DIGITAL CONTENT AND SHOPPING WITH AMAZON APP SUITE
The Amazon app suite provides seamless access to Amazon digital content and shopping right from your phone’s home screen. Interact with Amazon digital content you already own, access over 23 million games, books, apps, and songs, as well as shop millions of physical products in a single, fully-integrated, and easy-to-use experience.

ALL THE CONTENT
Get instant access to over 23 million games, books, apps, and songs including all of the most popular Android apps and games, over 20 million songs to download or instantly stream, and over one million Kindle books in the Kindle Store, including New York Times best sellers and new releases.

SEAMLESS SHOPPING
Instantly access Earth’s biggest selection with millions of physical products available to search or browse with the integrated mobile shopping experience, plus all of the benefits of shopping on Amazon, including personalized recommendations, customer reviews, 1-Click ordering, Prime FREE Two-Day shipping on over 15 million items, and more.

CROSS-CATEGORY SEARCH
Discover Amazon’s full selection of physical products, Kindle books, music, and apps from a single search directly from your phone’s home screen.

SINGLE SIGN IN
Enter your Amazon.com login just once to access all of Amazon Mobile Shopping, Kindle, MP3, and Amazon Appstore for Android apps, receive personalized recommendations, and interact with the Amazon digital content you already own right from your phone’s home screen.

1-CLICK ORDERING
Quickly and easily purchase new Kindle books, music, apps, and physical products with Amazon’s 1-Click Ordering, which allows you to skip the shopping cart and checkout process by using the default payment method and shipping address on your account.

"BUY ONCE, ENJOY EVERYWHERE"
With apps available on the largest number of devices and platforms, Amazon makes it easy for you to access your content anytime, anywhere, from virtually any device or platform you choose. You can read and sync your Kindle books across any device with the Kindle app installed, including Android phones and tablets, Windows 8 tablets, PC, Mac, iPad, iPhone, and in your web browser with Kindle Cloud Reader.

WORLD-CLASS CUSTOMER SERVICE
When a customer shops on Amazon, they know they’re getting Amazon’s world-class customer service. Amazon’s customer service just scored 89 on the ForeSee customer satisfaction score – the highest ever attained by a retailer – as well as the highest rating on the 2012 American Consumer Satisfaction Index, and the J.D. Power Customer Service Champion Award. So far in 2012, Kindle customer service has received a 97.1% satisfaction rate from customers. Customers have been shopping on Amazon for 15 years, and they continue to do so because of the unparalleled end-to-end customer experience.
